item.title: Priyanka Chopra: 'She was not going to be another pretty girl' - The Guardian
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra: 'She was not going to be another pretty girl'  The Guardian

It could have been any celebrity wedding: a former boyband star and an actor married in a lavish ceremony. There was a dedicated hashtag on Instagram. People Magazine scored the exclusive pictures. But this was India’s Rajasthan state, the bride was Priyanka Chopra, and during the five-day ceremony the groom, Nick Jonas, draped her in a mangalsutra – a traditional Hindu necklace she will wear until her husband’s death. The publicity blitz around “Nickyanka’s” nuptials has confirmed Chopra, 36, as the most successful Indian ever to make the leap from Bollywood star to American celebrity. In ...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra: The complicated feminist - CNN
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra: The complicated feminist  CNN

Rafia Zakaria is the author of "The Upstairs Wife: An Intimate History of Pakistan" (Beacon 2015) and "Veil" (Bloomsbury 2017). She is a columnist for Dawn newspaper in Pakistan and The Baffler. The views expressed in this commentary are her own. View more opinion on CNN. "Feminism is just saying give me opportunities without judging me for the decisions that I make, the same freedom that men have enjoyed for so many centuries," Priyanka Chopra explained in an interview last October. And for the most part, Chopra has done just that, using her stardom to propel from Bollywood movie star to a...

item.title: New York magazine deletes article calling Priyanka Chopra a 'scam artist' - The Guardian
item.description:
New York magazine deletes article calling Priyanka Chopra a 'scam artist'  The Guardian

New York magazine has deleted an article that labelled the actor Priyanka Chopra a “global scam artist” who had conned musician Nick Jonas into marrying her after it was widely panned, especially by Indian readers. The piece, published on the magazine’s the Cut website, a spinoff aimed at female readers, painted Chopra, 36, as a calculating figure whose relationship with Jonas was influenced more by a desire to further her career than love. “Nicholas Jonas married into a fraudulent relationship against his will this past Saturday,” the author, Mariah Smith, wrote. “All Nick wanted was a pos...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra responds to article calling her a 'scam artist' after marriage to Nick Jonas - The Independent
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra responds to article calling her a 'scam artist' after marriage to Nick Jonas  The Independent

Priyanka Chopra has responded to an article published in The Cut – an offshoot of New York Magazine – that branded her a "scam artist" and accused her of being "brand obsessed" following her marriage to singer and actor Nick Jonas. Chopra married Jonas in a three-day wedding celebration earlier this week. Shortly after the ceremony had concluded, The Cut article, titled "Is Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas's Love for Real?", questioned the legitimacy of their relationship. In the piece, writer and comedian Mariah Smith claimed that while Jonas was only looking for a "fling" with Hollywood's l...

item.title: The Cut’s attempted takedown of Priyanka Chopra echoes racism against successful Indian women - Fast Company
item.description:
The Cut’s attempted takedown of Priyanka Chopra echoes racism against successful Indian women  Fast Company

New York magazine’s women’s lifestyle section, The Cut, is not one to shy away from controversy. One recent story, for instance, focused on the disturbing thoughts that haunt new parents, including feeling like you want to hurt your baby. At the same time, the site is generally supportive of women, rather than trying to tear them down with misogyny, racism, and ageism. It tackles difficult, taboo issues—all for the sake of sparking a conversation that might ultimately make women’s lives better. But yesterday, The Cut did just the opposite: At around 5 p.m., it dropped a hugely offensive sto...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas share pictures from their gorgeous wedding - CNN
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas share pictures from their gorgeous wedding  CNN

Wow, check out that veil. Actress Priyanka Chopra shared photos and video on Tuesday of her breathtakingly beautiful wedding to singer Nick Jonas. One Instagram photo showed the couple dressed for their Hindu ceremony, which was held Sunday in Chopra's native India. The pair also held a Christian wedding ceremony the day prior, where Chopra wore a hand-beaded and embroidered Ralph Lauren gown with a 75-foot veil, according to People magazine. The "Quantico" star shared video of her walk down the aisle, escorted by her mother, Madhu. Jonas appears to wipe away a tear as his bride approaches....

item.title: Priyanka Chopra wore two wedding gowns to marry Nick Jonas - and people are obsessed with them - The Independent
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra wore two wedding gowns to marry Nick Jonas - and people are obsessed with them  The Independent

Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas have released more photos from their wedding celebration - including the stunning gowns worn during the wedding ceremonies honouring both of their backgrounds. For the bride’s first dress, worn for the Western ceremony, she wore a high-neck gown designed by Ralph Lauren that appears on the cover of People magazine. According to Chopra, she chose the designer after learning that Lauren had “only designed three wedding dresses in 50 years - one for his daughter, his daughter-in-law, and his niece.” - Read more Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas accused of animal cru...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra Stuns In 75-Foot-Long Veil At Wedding To Teary Nick Jonas - HuffPost
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra Stuns In 75-Foot-Long Veil At Wedding To Teary Nick Jonas  HuffPost

Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas are well on their way to a happily ever after. The couple of the moment tied the knot in not one but two fittingly lavish ceremonies to represent their different cultures and faiths in Jodhpur, India, over the weekend. Over the course of five days, guests from all over the world celebrated the pair with multiple pre-wedding ceremonies like a mehendi party and sangeet, which featured elaborate song and dance numbers featuring the bride, groom and extended family. In the couple’s Western wedding ceremony on Saturday, the two, dressed in custom Ralph Lauren ― a c...

item.title: Peta accuses Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas of 'animal cruelty' for using elephant and horse at wedding - The Independent
item.description:
Peta accuses Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas of 'animal cruelty' for using elephant and horse at wedding  The Independent

Singer Nick Jonas and actress Priyanka Chopra have been accused of promoting animal cruelty by using elephants and horses for their wedding. Campaign group Peta raised their concerns about the lavish ceremony at a palace in Jodhpur, India, in a tweet to the star couple on Monday morning. “Dear Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas. Elephants for weddings live in chains and horses are controlled with whips, spiked bits,” Peta said. "People are rejecting elephant rides and having horse-free weddings. Congrats, but we regret it was not a happy day for animals.” The tweet included a video of captive e...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas Wed in Lavish India Ceremony - VOA News
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas Wed in Lavish India Ceremony  VOA News

Bollywood actress Priyanka Chopra and American singer Nick Jonas have tied the knot at a lavish ceremony in a royal Indian palace before friends and family. Fireworks lit up the sky as the celebrity couple exchanged vows Saturday in a Christian ceremony at the opulent Umaid Bhawan palace in Jodhpur, in the western desert state of Rajasthan. They were joined in the fabled "Blue City" by their families, including Jonas's brother Joe Jonas and his fiancee, British actress and "Game of Thrones" star Sophie Turner. The multi-day festivities -- dubbed India's "wedding of the year" -- continue Sun...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas continue their wedding festivities with Hindu ceremony - CNN
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas continue their wedding festivities with Hindu ceremony  CNN

One day after marrying in a Christian ceremony, celebrity power couple Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas were continuing their wedding festivities Sunday evening with a traditional Hindu ceremony. The event was underway at the glitzy Umaid Bhawan Palace in Jodhpur, in the Rajasthan state of northwestern India. It was the fourth day of wedding festivities for the Indian actress, 36, and the American singer, 26, who announced their engagement in August. In a traditional Hindu ceremony garlands of flowers are first exchanged. The bride and groom then take their vows around a holy fire while a pri...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas are married - CNN
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas are married  CNN

After a four-month engagement, Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas are now officially married. The couple wed Saturday in Chopra's home country of India at the Umaid Bhawan Palace in Jodhpur, Rajasthan, according to People. The newlyweds were congratulated by Ralph Lauren, who designed a custom gown for the bride, 36, and dressed Jonas, 26, along with the entire wedding party. The couple's wedding festivities began Wednesday and will continue into the weekend. Saturday's Christian ceremony was officiated by Jonas' father, according to Vogue. A Hindu ceremony will take place Sunday. "People will ...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra marries Nick Jonas in three-day wedding spectacular in Rajasthan - The Telegraph
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra marries Nick Jonas in three-day wedding spectacular in Rajasthan  The Telegraph

With a barrage of spectacular fireworks lighting up the night sky over Jodhpur, Priyanka Chopra - a close friend of the Duchess of Sussex - married her fiance Nick Jonas on Saturday. The Indian-born actress, 36, and the 26-year-old American musician tied the knot at the Umaid Bhawan Palace in Rajasthan, just four months after their engagement. Jonas’s father, Paul Kevin Jonas Sr, a Christian pastor, conducted the ceremony, a culmination of three days of celebrations. The couples guests, who had begun arriving at the palace on Thursday afternoon, were presented with special personalized silv...

item.title: Nick Jonas Got Down On One Knee The First Time He Met Priyanka Chopra - HuffPost
item.description:
Nick Jonas Got Down On One Knee The First Time He Met Priyanka Chopra  HuffPost

Nick Jonas caught the lovebug so hard, he got down on one knee the first time he met his future fiancée, Priyanka Chopra. The two, who will wed on Saturday in Chopra’s home country of India, are opening up about their whirlwind romance for the January issue of Vogue before their sure-to-be fabulous nuptials. No, seriously. The former boy-bander is scheduled to enter via horseback with a sword and a turban, per Indian tradition, in one of two ceremonies the couple is hosting during a three-day celebration that has captured international attention. After sliding into each others DMs and texti...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas arrive in Jodhpur for wedding - CNN
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas arrive in Jodhpur for wedding  CNN

Speculation is growing over the long-awaited wedding of actor Priyanka Chopra and musician Nick Jonas after the couple was spotted in the Indian desert state of Rajasthan earlier this week. The couple announced their engagement in August on Instagram with Jonas posting a photo of him with Chopra, accompanied by the message: "Future Mrs. Jonas. My heart. My love." The announcement came after weeks of rumors that the couple had been dating. Now it seems they're finally ready to tie the knot. The bride posted a photograph of herself at her bridal shower in New York in October. "Love, laughter ...

item.title: Deepika Padukone reveals striking outfit from wedding to Ranveer Singh - CNN
item.description:
Deepika Padukone reveals striking outfit from wedding to Ranveer Singh  CNN

One of the biggest names in Bollywood, Deepika Padukone, has married fellow actor Ranveer Singh in a star-studded ceremony in Lake Como, Italy. While the wedding was a closely-guarded affair -- the couple reportedly asked guests to follow a strict no-photo policy -- pictures emerged Thursday showing the model-turned-actress adorned in red and gold, lavish colors traditionally favored by Indian brides. The wedding was a two-day affair with local media reporting that two ceremonies took place, a Konkani ceremony on Wednesday followed by a Sindhi one, to reflect Padukone and Singh's background...

item.title: Bollywood's Highest-Paid 2017: Meet 10 Indian Actors Making Bank - Forbes Now
item.description:
Bollywood's Highest-Paid 2017: Meet 10 Indian Actors Making Bank  Forbes Now

Design by Nick DeSantis, Forbes Staff Tinseltown isn’t the only film industry minting millionaires. Indian movies gross far less than their American-made counterparts, but they are typically produced for much cheaper–and recoup costs by selling satellite rights to TV channels. Despite declining pricetags for those rights, Indian actors are still cashing in from film fees and endorsements. Meet the ten highest-paid stars in Bollywood. Design by Nick DeSantis, Forbes Staff King Khan leads the lot, banking big from starring roles in movies such as Raees, for which he earns upfront fees and a c...

item.title: There's One Big Catch With Gap's New Ad Celebrating Diversity - HuffPost
item.description:
There's One Big Catch With Gap's New Ad Celebrating Diversity  HuffPost

A new Gap campaign directed by British Vogue’s Editor-in-Chief Edward Enninful is being widely praised for its diverse cast of characters, including big names like Christie Brinkley, Maria Borges, Wiz Khalifa and Priyanka Chopra. But do you notice anything in particular about the group of happy people chosen to “embody American culture today,” according to a campaign caption? If you guessed the sheer lack of body or size diversity, you’d be correct. Eninful, who in April became the first black editor of British Vogue, knocked it out of the park as far as racial diversity goes. He also inclu...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra apologises for modelling top 'insensitive towards migrants and refugees' - The Telegraph
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra apologises for modelling top 'insensitive towards migrants and refugees'  The Telegraph

Priyanka Chopra has apologised for modelling a top for a travel magazine cover that was criticised for being insensitive towards refugees and migrants. The Bollywood actress wore a top with the words "migrant", "refugee" and "outsider" crossed out and the word "traveller" highlighted in a photo that was used on the front cover of Conde Nast Traveller. Chopra was accused of belittling the plight of migrants: @priyankachopra@CNTIndia 2/n I wish my grannie was alive to tell u that she didn't choose to be a refugee Kashmiri Pandit in her country — Megha Raina (@MeghaRaina2) October 9, 2016 @pri...

Never one to shy away from voicing his opinions, celebrity chef Gordon Ramsay has made trolling people’s culinary creations on Twitter somewhat of a past time. item.title: Zac Efron Is Looking Fine As Ever In These New 'Baywatch' Posters - The Huffington Post
item.description:
Zac Efron Is Looking Fine As Ever In These New 'Baywatch' Posters  The Huffington Post

The thirst is real. Zac Efron has always been a dreamboat. But the 29-year-old actor is looking mighty muscled in new posters for the upcoming “Baywatch” film. Efron flaunts a shredded ― hold on, let us count ― eight-pack in his shirtless pose. The cheeky promotional posters play off the common “Game of Thrones” refrain, “Winter is coming.” Efron, Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson, Priyanka Chopra and more “Baywatch” stars pose in swimsuits and winter gear, heating up the chilly snowscape. “Baywatch” is set to hit theaters on May 26, and you can bet we’ll be there. We’ll be ready. Check out the pos...

item.title: The King Is Back: Shah Rukh Khan And Ritesh Sidhwani Prep 'Don 3' - Forbes Now
item.description:
The King Is Back: Shah Rukh Khan And Ritesh Sidhwani Prep 'Don 3'  Forbes Now

The 6-year hiatus for one of India’s biggest, best, and longest-running action franchises is finally over. In a not-exactly-official announcement, Producer Ritesh Sidhwani posted a photo of Don star Shah Rukh Khan on Instagram, along with such accompanying hashtags as #cool #suave #sexycriminal #don and #don3. He closed with a tantalizing finish: “Hmmmm #staytuned.” Read More: 3 Indian Celebrities Make Forbes 100 Highest-Paid List The post was taken down, but not before it set Bollywood tongues wagging about the possibly imminent start of a new entry in the storied action franchise. After a...

item.title: Exclusive Photos From The 2017 Met Gala You Won't Find Anywhere Else - HuffPost
item.description:
Exclusive Photos From The 2017 Met Gala You Won't Find Anywhere Else  HuffPost

Fashion’s biggest night of the year has arrived, and this time it’s gone completely avant-garde. The 2017 Met Gala paid homage to Comme des Garçons and Rei Kawakubo, the fashion house’s visionary founder and designer of over 40 years. It’s the first time the costume institute has dedicated its theme and exhibit to a living designer since the Yves Saint Laurent exhibit in 1983, according to Vogue. Kawakubo’s designs are known for their construction (and often deconstruction), raw edges and unusual shapes. The celebrities, models and designers in attendance stayed true to those concepts. Katy...

item.title: Is Raunchy Box Office Flop 'Baywatch' Too Racy For India? - Forbes Now
item.description:
Is Raunchy Box Office Flop 'Baywatch' Too Racy For India?  Forbes Now

Dwayne Johnson and Priyanka Chopra (Photo by Andreas Rentz/Getty Images for Paramount Pictures) American lifeguard film Baywatch was released in India on Friday June 2, 2017, a week after its release in the United States, and widespread reviews panning the film poured in right before it began screening here, which dented the excitement Indian movie buffs had built up ever since it was first announced over a year ago that the film would star our very own Priyanka Chopra. But if the abysmal ratings abroad and the reports that Chopra’s role is more like an extended cameo weren’t disappointing ...

item.title: Can Priyanka Chopra Rescue Paramount Flop 'Baywatch' In India? - Forbes Now
item.description:
Can Priyanka Chopra Rescue Paramount Flop 'Baywatch' In India?  Forbes Now

BERLIN, GERMANY – MAY 30: Dwayne Johnson and Priyanka Chopra are seen on stage at the ‘Baywatch’ Photo Call at Sony Centre on May 30, 2017 in Berlin, Germany. (Photo by Andreas Rentz/Getty Images for Paramount Pictures) Paramount’s big screen adaptation of the TV series Baywatch belly-flopped in the U.S. last weekend despite an attractive cast led by the usually bankable Dwayne Johnson and Zac Efron. So can the studio hope the critically-maligned action-comedy directed by Seth Gordon will fare better in India this weekend, banking on the popularity of co-star Priyanka Chopra in her Hollywoo...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra's 'Baywatch' Bellyflops In India With 1.5 Crore Rs / $230K Debut - Forbes Now
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra's 'Baywatch' Bellyflops In India With 1.5 Crore Rs / $230K Debut  Forbes Now

After watching their wannabe franchise Baywatch sink beneath the waves like a cement surfboard in North America, Paramount Pictures (NASDAQ: VIAB) might have hoped that Priyanka Chopra, the picture’s charismatic female lead, would conjure up a heroic rescue for their movie in her home territory of India when it opened there this past Friday. Priyanka Chopra’s presence did little to help ‘Baywatch’ in its India release But it wasn’t to be. Although they plastered their star’s image everywhere in the attempt to ease the raunchy R-rated comedy out from the watery depths of box office submersio...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra Backs Amrinder Gill's Punjabi Action Drama 'Sarvann' - Forbes Now
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra Backs Amrinder Gill's Punjabi Action Drama 'Sarvann'  Forbes Now

BEVERLY HILLS, CA – JANUARY 08: Actresses Priyanka Chopra (L) and Sofia Vergara attend the 18th Annual Post-Golden Globes Party hosted by Warner Bros. Pictures and InStyle at The Beverly Hilton Hotel on January 8, 2017 in Beverly Hills, California. (Photo by Frazer Harrison/Getty Images) Last year director Karaan Guliani was keen for Priyanka Chopra to star in a Bollywood film he’d written but was told by reps for the Bollywood/Hollywood actress that she was busy with the ABC drama series series Quantico and he’d have to wait at least 18 months before she might be available. So Guliani deci...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra: How to fight stigma of sexual abuse - CNN
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra: How to fight stigma of sexual abuse  CNN

On May 4, 2017 in Zimbabwe, UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador Priyanka Chopra (right), her hand on the shoulder of an adolescent sitting beside her, listens during a meeting with adolescents living with HIV, at the AFRICAID support center in Avondale, a suburb of Harare, the capital. AFRICAID provides specialized services in support of the Government's National Action Plan for Orphans and Vulnerable Children. Interventions, led by young people living with HIV, provide HIV-positive children and other vulnerable children and their families with the knowledge, skills and confidence they need to stay ...

item.title: Baywatch review – there's no saving this meat-headed caper - The Telegraph
item.description:
Baywatch review – there's no saving this meat-headed caper  The Telegraph

Director: Seth Gordon. Starring: Dwayne Johnson, Zac Efron, Alexandra Daddario, Kelly Rohrbach, Priyanka Chopra. 15 cert; 116 mins As a TV show in the Nineties, Baywatch became a worldwide phenomenon, a kitsch classic serving up sun, semi-naked beauties and very silly storylines. It was the stuff of teenage fantasies, so fixated was it with bums and boobs, jiggling away in sleazy slow-mo. As a film, it takes all these elements and jacks them up with steroids and machismo. Everything about Baywatch the movie is big, brash and bombastic. Take its star, Dwayne Johnson. Radiating power and aggr...

item.title: Bollywood star Priyanka Chopra apologises over 'insensitive' refugee T-shirt - The Guardian
item.description:
Bollywood star Priyanka Chopra apologises over 'insensitive' refugee T-shirt  The Guardian

Popular Bollywood actress Priyanka Chopra has apologised after modelling an “insensitive” T-shirt on the cover of Condé Nast Traveller magazine. The 34-year-old former Miss World is featured on the cover of the October edition of Condé Nast Traveller India wearing a white T-shirt with the words, “REFUGEE“, “IMMIGRANT” and “OUTSIDER” crossed out in red – leaving only the word “TRAVELLER”. The message behind our 6th anniversary issue cover. https://t.co/seAZzX1BPb #PCinCNT #WhyWeTravel pic.twitter.com/73rdX2af9Q — Condé Nast Traveller (@CNTIndia) October 10, 2016 Condé Nast Traveller tweeted ...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra Lands A Huge Gig With Pantene - The Huffington Post
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra Lands A Huge Gig With Pantene  The Huffington Post

Priyanka Chopra induces hair envy the world over, and now she’s taking her talents to an extremely fitting new job. Pantene announced Tuesday that the “Quantico” star is the brand’s newest global ambassador, making her one more strong woman representing their “Strong is Beautiful” campaign. Chopra currently serves as a UNICEF global Goodwill Ambassador as well as a Girl Up champion, helping the United Nations program “raise awareness and funds... that provide girls around the world with life-changing opportunities like the chance to go to school, see a doctor and stay safe from violence.” S...

item.title: The trailer for 'Baywatch' is everything you imagined - CNN
item.description:
The trailer for 'Baywatch' is everything you imagined  CNN

"It's up to us to restore the Baywatch brand." This line from the just-released "Baywatch" movie trailer is a little on the nose, but it is true nonetheless. The fate of the "Baywatch" name is in the hands of The Rock, Zac Efron, Priyanka Chopra and many other pretty, tanned people. Their plan? To unleash upon summer movie goers a film with action, gun fights, bathing suits, and gross-out humor, including a gag-worthy scene at a morgue that's teased in the promo embedded below. (Warning: The trailer contains adult language.) "Baywatch" will be rated R and is set for release on May 26. ©2017...

item.title: Priyanka Chopra Has The Best Response To Possibly Playing A Bond Girl - HuffPost
item.description:
Priyanka Chopra Has The Best Response To Possibly Playing A Bond Girl  HuffPost

When it comes to the future of James Bond movies, these actresses would like the famous spy character shaken and stirred. Asked by James Corden about rumors that they might play Bond girls, Priyanka Chopra of “Baywatch” and Kaya Scodelario of the newest “Pirates of the Caribbean” installment had some awesome answers on Wednesday’s “Late Late Show.” “I’d much rather be the one that finally gets to kill Bond and doesn’t have to sleep with him,” Scodelario said. Chopra went with one better: “I’d always said I’d prefer to play Bond,” the “Quantico” star said. (”And not ‘Jane,’” she told Refiner...

item.title: 'Wonder Woman' Beats 'Baywatch' In India, Just, While Tendulkar Biopic Bats On - Forbes Now
item.description:
'Wonder Woman' Beats 'Baywatch' In India, Just, While Tendulkar Biopic Bats On  Forbes Now

Gal Gadot in ‘Wonder Woman’ Wonder Woman beat Baywatch in India last weekend, but by a much slimmer margin than the worldwide results of both titles may have indicated. Meanwhile Sachin: A Billion Dreams, the biopic of Indian cricket icon Sachin Tendulkar, batted on in its second innings, beating a raft of new Hindi releases. Warner Bros. reported the superhero adventure starring Gal Gadot and Chris Pine was the market’s top title, grossing 88.5 million rupees ($1.3 million) from the English-only release on 349 screens. Pro-rata, that is way below the estimated U.S. opening of $100.5 milli...

item.title: Sofia Vergara named world's highest-paid TV actress for sixth year running - The Telegraph
item.description:
Sofia Vergara named world's highest-paid TV actress for sixth year running  The Telegraph

Modern Family actress Sofia Vergara has ranked as the highest-paid TV actress in the world for the sixth year running, with Forbes Magazine's annual list declaring her earnings in the past year at just over $41 million. While Vergara earns around $500,000 per episode of her show, and has worked on films in the last year including The Emoji Movie, the actress receives most of her earnings from endorsement deals. Along with being the spokesperson for Head & Shoulders, she is also the star of ads for Covergirl Cosmetics and has advertised for gyms, furniture collections, supermarkets and resta...

item.title: India's Box Office Queen Deepika Padukone Re-Ups For Another 'xXx' Tour - Forbes Now
item.description:
India's Box Office Queen Deepika Padukone Re-Ups For Another 'xXx' Tour  Forbes Now

Director DJ Caruso has confirmed that Deepika Padukone will reprise her role in the next installment of the Vin Diesel-starring action franchise xXx. The 31-year-old Indian actress made her Hollywood debut in xXx: The Return of Xander Cage, playing the part of Serena Unger in the multi-cultural star-studded cast that included Diesel, Donnie Yen, Kris Wu, Tony Jaa, Samuel Jackson, Ice Cube, and in a cameo, soccer superstar Neymar. Bollywood superstar Deepika Padukone In the decade since her 2007 film debut opposite Shah Rukh Khan in the romantic musical Om Shanti Om, the Bangalore-born Paduk...

item.title: Tamil Star Vijay and Keerthy Suresh Shine In 'Bairavaa' While 'OK Jaanu' Opens OK In India - Forbes Now
item.description:
Tamil Star Vijay and Keerthy Suresh Shine In 'Bairavaa' While 'OK Jaanu' Opens OK In India  Forbes Now

Vijay in ‘Bairavaa” (Photo credit: Vijaya Productions) Tamil writer-director Bharathan’s action thriller Bairavaa, which stars Ilayathalapathy Vijay in his 60th film and Keerthy Suresh, was the stand-out new release in India last weekend as well as collecting tidy sums in other markets. Meanwhile OK Jaanu, a romantic drama pitched at Millennials starring Shraddha Kapoor and Aditya Roy Kapur, had a decent debut. Aamir Khan’s all-time record- breaker Dangal is seemingly unstoppable, still earning decent money in its fourth weekend. Paramount launched the Vin Diesel actioner xXx: The Return of...
